title: Boots of lightness

properties.value: Boots of lightness are found in the cellar of the Temple of Ikov dungeon, but do not require starting the Temple of Ikov quest. They reduce weight by 4.535 kg when worn. While this grants a higher weight-reduction than the graceful boots, it does not give an increase to run energy restoration rate.

SMW Subobject for WornHigh Alchemy value: 3Examine: Magic boots that make you lighter than normal.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Boots of lightnessUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Boots of lightness.pngWeight: -4.535Value: 6Version anchor: WornRelease date: 17 June 2002Item ID: 89

Boots of lightness are found in the cellar of the Temple of Ikov dungeon, but do not require starting the Temple of Ikov quest. They reduce weight by 4.535 kg when worn. While this grants a higher weight-reduction than the graceful boots, it does not give an increase to run energy restoration rate.

The cellar is down a set of stairs directly west of the dungeon's entrance ladder. A light source and a slash weapon or knife are required to get to the spawn. Their respawn time is 60 seconds. Players can hop between worlds to quickly obtain multiple pairs.

If lost it can be reobtained by:

  • Picking up the boots in the Temple of Ikov dungeon.
  • Purchasing them from Perdu for 9,800 coins.

While this grants a higher [[Weight-reducing clothing|weight-reduction]] than the [[graceful boots]], it does not give an increase to [[Energy|run energy]] restoration rate. The cellar is down a set of stairs directly west of the dungeon's entrance ladder. A [[light source]] and a [[slash weapon]] or [[knife]] are required to get to the spawn. Their [[respawn]] time is 60 seconds. Players can hop between worlds to quickly obtain multiple pairs.
